actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to repeal section 2 of the 25th article of amendment to such Constitution (relating to succession to the Vice Presidency).

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Repeals section 2 of the twenty-fifth article of amendment to the U.S. Constitution (relating to succession to the Vice Presidency).

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to repeal section 2 of the 25th article of amendment to such Constitution (relating to succession to the Vice Presidency).
